text: Anne Sylvestre (, born Anne-Marie Beugras 20 June 1934 – 30 November 2020) was a French singer-songwriter and guitarist. She was born in Lyon, France. She was known for her children's songs such as "Fabulettes" (1962). She also appeared many times as a musical guest on the television program Discorama. Sylvestre died in Paris on 30 November 2020 from problems caused by a stroke, aged 86.Anne Sylvestre, chanteuse pour petits et grands et artiste féministe, est morte ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:French singers Category:French songwriters Category:French guitarists Category:People from Lyon
title: Anne Sylvestre
